title: There is no clean exit
content: You either leave too early and remain misunderstood, or stay too long and rot with the furniture.

title: Schrödinger's situationship
content: We are both together and broken up until someone checks the chat. Please don't check.

title: emotional object permanence
content: Out of sight ≠ out of mind. More like out of sight = spiraling simulation of every possible conversation

title: The 3 AM firmware update
content: Suddenly remembered something embarrassing from 2012 and my brain installed version 2.0 of the cringe patch
